body_html:
Also, @fxsuper, looks like it works, but please file the bug to add the op-registered support for tf.cross that does the "desugaring" you've suggested: https://gist.github.com/learyg/4019bae1cfc5bacbcdb318fd882b4d5d

Looks like it fuses somewhat reasonably, but the CPU backend doesn't seem to currently support fusing the slice operation into its consumers, so it could be better. Thanks for filing!
body_text:

Looks like it fuses somewhat reasonably, but the CPU backend doesn't seem to currently support fusing the slice operation into its consumers, so it could be better. Thanks for filing!
body:
Also, @fxsuper, looks like it works, but please file the bug to add the op-registered support for tf.cross that does the "desugaring" you've suggested: https://gist.github.com/learyg/4019bae1cfc5bacbcdb318fd882b4d5d

Looks like it fuses somewhat reasonably, but the CPU backend doesn't seem to currently support fusing the slice operation into its consumers, so it could be better. Thanks for filing!
